actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Murkowski without amendment. With written report No. 104-110.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 143.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Production and Regulation

official_title: A bill to extend the deadline under the Federal Power Act applicable to the construction of two hydroelectric projects in North Carolina, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon request of the respective licensees, to extend for a maximum of five consecutive two-year periods the time required for commencing construction of two specified hydroelectric projects in North Carolina.

titles.title: A bill to extend the deadline under the Federal Power Act applicable to the construction of two hydroelectric projects in North Carolina, and for other purposes.
